sponsor.partnerMessage: CACHE provides resources to connect NWA artists and creative organizations to the community. Visit our artist directory to connect with and hire local musicians, photographers, muralists, and more! Looking for something else? Learn about all of CACHE's resources today!

posts.title: Thanksgiving Day 5Ks Happening All Over Northwest Arkansas
posts.content:
Start your Thanksgiving Day off with a run, and it will be a whole lot easier to convince yourself you earned another trip to the dessert table. Turkey Day Races are happening all over NWA this Thursday. 

  • Bentonville: The Gobbler 5K and mile fun run will begin at 7:30a from 1101 SW Citizen Cir.
  • Rogers: The Turkey Trot for Heroes 5K will begin at 9a from 1200 W. Walnut St., featuring a traditional 5K run and the Wild Gobbler 5K, which adds 5 stations of exercise dedicated to Fallen Heroes throughout the run. 
  • Springdale: Join the 12th Annual SHS Bulldog Football Turkey Trot for a 5K, 10K, or mile fun run. 
  • Fayetteville: Beginning at Ozark Natural Foods at 9a, take part in the first ever Turkey Trot-n-Trek for a 5K run or 1K walk. 

Stay up to date on local races HERE.

posts.title: Meet Santa & Mrs. Claus At Shiloh Museum Of Ozark History
posts.topic: Sponsored by Shiloh Museum of Ozark History
posts.content:
Stop by Shiloh Museum of Ozark History during the Christmas on the Creek celebration in Downtown Springdale to snap some pictures with Santa and Mrs. Claus from 11a-5p on Saturday, Nov 26. 

  • In the bag: After you've given your wish list to Santa, grab a few gifts of your own for friends and family at the museum store where you can find Ozark-related books, old-time toys, souvenirs, and more. 
  • Stick around: Take a look around and enjoy the museum’s current special exhibits: Ken Smith's Buffalo River Country, featuring a photo history of the Buffalo River, and Digi Know?, showcasing the museum’s process for preserving historic photos. 

Learn more about the museum HERE.

posts.title: Bentonville Startup Addressing Inefficiencies In Healthcare
posts.content:
Bentonville-based healthcare technology startup Soda Health is working to eliminate health care inequities and create a healthier America. 

  • Inaccessible: Every year, Americans miss out on billions of dollars worth of supplemental benefits available to them through their health insurance providers. 
  • Determined: Soda Health is developing a technology platform that will enable health plans to reimburse members for goods and services not supported by traditional medical claims. 

Read more on the story HERE.

posts.title: Tecovas Opening Store At Pinnacle Hills Promenade In Rogers
posts.content:
Tecovas, the direct-to-consumer cowboy boot and Western apparel brand, will soon open a retail location in Rogers’ Pinnacle Hills Promenade. 

  • High steppin’: Quality boots with a timeless design, Tecovas are handmade in Léon, Mexico with classic construction techniques that take over 200 steps. 
  • If the boot fits: Interested joining the founding team? The Rogers’ Tecovas Store is currently hiring for all positions. 

Learn more about the upcoming store HERE.

posts.title: Southern Living Named Bentonville On List Of Top Southern Destinations
posts.content:
Southern culture magazine, Southern Living, made a list of top destinations to consider when planning trips for the new year, and Bentonville made the list. 

  • Naturally: Referring to Bentonville as an “artsy city with an outdoor soul”, the article highlighted the region’s mountain biking opportunities, Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, and The Momentary. 
  • For the foodies: Travelers with an appetite will love the area's budding culinary scene, particularly Bentonville's three 2022 James Beard Semifinalists: The Hive, The Preacher’s Son, and Yeyo’s. 

Find the full list of destinations HERE.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Educating the future: Apply before January to join the amazing things happening at Thaden School, the #1 Private School in Arkansas.*
  • Just a bite: Eat your way through Northwest Arkansas with the NWA Bite Book, a local restaurant guide featuring deals and discounts. Or treat a visiting guest to one of their Weekender Postcards. Use promo code BITEOFXMAS for 25% off!*
  • Poinsettias: Beyond A Step’s poinsettia drive will support the non-profit’s work to create communities of care for the region’s first responders.* 
  • iRazorbacks: The U of A ranked 20th in the nation and earned a five-star rating for excellence in its online degree programs. 
  • Join us: Would you like to share something in our newsletter? Check out our deals HERE. 
  • Taking a turkey break: Enjoy your Thanksgiving holiday! We’ll be back in your inbox next Monday.

*Content is sponsored
